Articles.Content:
Who\'s hyped for this movie?

***CAUSE I AM.***

So, what are your impressions from the various trailers and plot synopses we have been given?

I\'ve long since stopped being hyped for hollywood production, i reserve that for local stuff now.

I really hope they pull it off properly, i really do.

Slightly hyped for it... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

But more hyped for The Hobbit. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It has got Arthur Dent in!

Heh.

Prometheus is supposed to be set a long time before Alien, same universe but different plot drives. Otherwise, it apparently has a similar horror level to Alien itself - after all, Ridley Scott *is* the director.

> 
> But more hyped for The Hobbit. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> It has got Arthur Dent in!

Simon Jones isn\'t in hobbit is he? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Looking forward to Michael Fassbender in Prometheus. The David viral was awesome, classic sci fi stuff.

hyped for the dictator

(we in swansea have had the idea for years ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

> 
> hyped for the dictator
> 
> (we in swansea have had the idea for years ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

Eh, you should start your own thread if you want to talk about the Dictator. I\'m telling you, because you\'re the first person who\'s post has no relavence to the topic of Prometheus whatsoever. It\'s fine to mention other movies because you think they\'ll be better, but please remember what this thread is about.

Never said the Hobbit would be better... I\'ve just been waiting so long... So long...

'So long and thanks for all the -' I\'m getting my wires crossed...

Will be seeing Prometheus though, I\'ve just got to establish whether I go with my friends or my dad...

> 
> Never said the Hobbit would be better... I\'ve just been waiting so long... So long...
> 
> 'So long and thanks for all the -' I\'m getting my wires crossed...
> 
> Will be seeing Prometheus though, I\'ve just got to establish whether I go with my friends or my dad...

Your Dad will probably be old enough to have seen Alien when that was in the cinemas, though that might mean he wouldn\'t appreciate Prometheus because he sees it as \'not classic\' or something. If he does appeciate it, then in might be in part to his understanding the references.
